alert.note: Alert for Chester; Hardeman; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:31PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Hardeman, southern Madison and west central Chester Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 431 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Chickasaw State Forest, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Chickasaw State Forest, Chickasaw State Park, Silerton, Bemis, Toone, Medon, Neely, Pinson, Malesus, Pine Top, Parkburg, Westover, Madison Hall, Uptonville, Deanburg, Teague, Five Points, Maple Grove and East Union. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
